how_to_play.title: How to Play
how_to_play.step1_body: x86 machine code instructions are displayed one byte at a succession.
how_to_play.step2_body: Interpret and mentally execute the displayed instruction sequence as x86 assembly.
how_to_play.step3_body: After all instructions are shown, enter the execution result as a hexadecimal number and submit.
how_to_play.feedback_body: Please report bugs or suggestions via GitHub Issues. All feedback is warmly welcome!
